post.body: aroo roo roo. we will devour your entrails and bury your tail between the couch cushions. nothing personal.
nah, we were pooping and getting yelled at by the guy at the church next door. it was good to see you.
getting to go to the dog park on a rare late evening surprise trip. also, eating hot dogs.
Digesting our buy-three-get-one-free double pig ear snack, and resting from having so many visitors and walks and stuff. Not fetching.
Sleeping hard after another long dark park session. Tootie has some chafing in her pitarms from the new harness, but nothing major.
Sleeping hard after two consecutive days of 2 hours at the dogs park. Also, air-drying.
eating breakfast, missing brittney and lisey, shedding
sleeping for hours after going to the dog park. scratching. twitching.
eating peanut butter straight out of the jar
panting after a long walk
Afternoon snack: Prime rib
refusing to play outside because it is too hot
being suspiciously quiet outside
Raising hell.
fighting over who gets to sit on mama's head
barking at the kitchen door (tootie mostly)
Sharing a crate.
Missing our Mom. She's so awesome. She also smells better than Dad.
sleeping on the floor
barking at crows
